name: Optimized Casting
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You place a fragment of your mind in any number of creatures you choose within range, which helps them to cast spells. When they cast a spell, subtract the tier of the spell from the MP cost. As a response to an affected creature casting a spell, you can grant them 1 AP. This response costs 0 AP the first time you use it between each of your turns, and 1 AP afterwards.

A creature that is out of range is not affected by this spell until they return into range. You are not affected by this spell.
